author: Maxim Lott
title: Paid to quit? Backlash builds against unemployment benefits on ‘steroids’
description: For an economy already fractured by social distancing policies meant to curb the spread of the coronavirus, the perverse incentive threatens to do further damage, according to workers, business owners and economists who spoke to Fox News.
content:
